name: Exquisite Profiles
description:
The project investigates how world elements, as humans, are represented, reinterpreted, and codified through architectural
software datasets, turning in standardized codifications that can become ways of evaluation based on appearance.
By playing this game, you are going to challenge the type of representation that we create in urban planning,
by aiming to questions the absurdity of today’s society classifications and the political logic behind them.

More info at hello@benedettadallacosta.com
